description: The humble packet of instant ramen noodles gets a tasty upgrade with this easy hack recipe. Add a few fresh additions, your meal is ready in 10 minutes.
name: Ramen Hack Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 bunch baby pak choy, ends trimmed

recipeInstructions.text: Place seasoning sachet from noodle packet, egg and mayonnaise in a medium bowl. Whisk to combine.

Cook noodles according to packet instructions, adding pak choy in the last 30 seconds of cooking. Drain, reserving 1 tbs cooking liquid. Remove pak choy and set aside. Add noodles to egg mixture with reserved cooking liquid, then stir to combine. Transfer noodle mixture to a bowl. Serve topped with pak choy, shallots and chilli flakes.
